summary: This mod adds a sword with the ability to Push (Unrelenting Force) staggered enemies away and a chance to disarm them when pushed.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first Skyrim mod.

This mod adds The Banishing Blade, a sword with the ability to Push (Unrelenting Force) staggered enemies away and a chance to disarm them .

Alternate version SF-Gungnir
Adds a Greataxe instead with the same power, a more reasonable choice of weapon for the Push effect and harder to do the push due to slower swing speed.

I tried not to make it overpowered, the push effect does no damage (except fall damage).
Useful for when in combat with multiple enemies, its found in the Riverwood Trader 2nd floor.

(DOES NOT CONFLICT WITH VANILLA BEHEADING KILLMOVES)
author: Darkbarrow
